document_data.name: Kamburan
document_data.mainbody: '''Kamburan''' was a [[Waterdhavian]] merchant in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In early spring of the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, Kamburan was in debt to the moneylender [[Caethur]] and met with him and five other debtors in a room overlooking [[Jembril Street]]. He made the payment to Caethur, but was later slain by the moneylender anyway, as he was a witness to his murder of [[Aldurl Nael]].
document_data.Description: Kamburan had a white beard. During the meeting in which he was slain, he wore a flame-silk overtunic.
document_data.Personality: To Caethur at least, Kamburan had too sharp a tongue.
document_data.Possessions: As of his last meeting, he was carrying a small, glossy-polished wooden chest with seven [[beljuril]]s inside.
